p.span: ♪ I can live without the milkman
♪ By the lowly likes of me ♪

div.p:
I can't believe
Vanessa threw us a shower.

If I'd have known we were gonna
get so much cool shit,

I would have proposed to you
a long time ago.
Do you think we could ask her

to throw us another one
after the wedding?
I can't tell if you're joking.
Well, you can't just leave it there.
Did you guys run out of gas?

It's-- it's just a poor,
defenseless, little squirrel!

Are you sure that we can't do
anything for you?

Can we take you someplace...
safe?

You said you ran over a turtle
on the way to pick up the rings.

Do you really think
it's a coincidence

that a squirrel would run
right out in front of our car?

that have given their lives
to send us a message.

Nature doesn't want us
to get married.

You make up all this bullshit,
and it just spins you out of control.

Nature doesn't give
a shit about us, Nikki.

We're... we're getting married
because we want to.
And so I can get on your insurance.

What if we aren't meant
to be together?

She can't find the water shutoff valve,
and the house is flooding.

Well, that Nikki's
a fine-looking woman.

If you don't marry her quick,
I might just have to tap that myself.

Oh, ah, we ran over
a squirrel yesterday
on the way home from the shower.
His body was all messed up.

He was looking up at me
like he knew.

He knew I was gonna...
help him.

And Nikki's screaming her head off
the whole time.

The little guy, man,
he was a real fighter.

I'll never forget the look in his eyes,
like he was thanking me.
And I bashed his head in.
You did what you had to do.

But Nikki, she's, she's always afraid
I'm gonna start using again.
She thought this was a sign,

like God's trying to tell us
not to get married.

And I know it's all bullshit,
but it freaks me out

when she says crap like that,
y'know?

A lesser man
would've kept on driving.
I never know what God's thinking.
It never makes any sense to me.

Would you like to take her
for a test drive?
I'll be over here if you need me.

What's your rush
to get married, anyway?
I just don't wanna lose her.

Jason, I think you and I should say
a prayer for that squirrel.

Dear Lord, thank You
for all the creatures

And thank You for the squirrel
and the lesson he gave to Jason.

Thank You for all the tests
You put before us.

Please continue to strengthen us,
oh, Lord,
and to show us the right path.

I'm gonna show these pussies
how to lie down and buy a car.
You have never looked more lovely.

And he had a big sale
to wrap up at work.

You've been making excuses for him
ever since you met him.

I mean, he's gonna be
a great husband and daddy.

A year ago you wanted
nothing to do with him.
A year from now, who knows?

It's not that
he's completely hopeless.
I got here as quick as I could.
Okay, uh, Baby, let's go on up.

Now that we're all here,
we can get started.

Marriage is an honorable estate,
not to be entered into lightly,

Nicole, have you come here today
of your own free will
to take Jason to be your lawful--?
That was not gunfire you just heard.
A bird flew into the window up there.

I guess we need to put up
some of those stickers.

p.span: ♪ I've got my baby beside me ♪
♪ I've got my one true love
♪ And how'd you get to be
♪ I've got my one true love
♪ I've got my baby beside me ♪

div.p:
No live animals showed up to work
on this film.
